articles.title: NASA Astronomy Picture of the Day 12 May 2023: Comet Halley's dust reveals BREATHTAKING view - HT Tech
articles.description: NASA Astronomy Picture of the Day 12th May shows a magnificent view of Halley’s Dust in the night sky.
articles.content: During the early days of May, the night skies were adorned with mesmerizing trails of cosmic dust. Grain travelled through space while leaving streaks across the skies of Earth, NASA shared. What was… [+1965 chars]
